item.description: A look at the careful steps taken to move a stalled or obstructing vehicle safely off the road, highlighting strategy and teamwork. How do crews keep traffic and safety in mind?

item.title: Towing a vehicle the wrong way
item.description: A challenging recovery situation where a vehicle needed to be towed backwards, highlighting strategy, planning, and problem-solving. How do crews adapt to unusual towing requests?
